TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed ReceiveErrorHandling extends System.Enum

summary.span: 取得或設定指定如何處理有害訊息的列舉值。

span.span: An enumeration that specifies handling for a poison message.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有害訊息指的是嘗試重複傳送訊息至應用程式失敗的訊息。A poison message is a message that fails repeated attempts to deliver to the application. 只有在使用訊息佇列 (MSMQ) 繫結時才適用。This is applicable only when using a Message Queuing (MSMQ)-based binding. 預設值為 `Fault`，會造成接聽程式，因此也就是 ServiceHost 的錯誤。The default value is `Fault`, which faults the listener and therefore the ServiceHost. 發生服務因為有害訊息而錯誤的狀況時，就會擲出 。In the case where the service was to fault because of a poison message, a is thrown. 例外包含 MSMQ 訊息的 `LookupId`，可使用 System.Messaging API 將訊息排除。The exception contains the `LookupId` of the MSMQ message that can be used to move the message out of the way using System.Messaging API. 列舉值的某些值，例如 `Reject` 與 `Move` 只在 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]上可使用。Certain values of the enumeration such as `Reject` and `Move` are only available on [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]. 您可設定 屬性為此列舉的其中一個值，以控制有害訊息的處理方式。You control poison message handling by setting the property to one of the values of this enumeration. ## Examples 下列組態程式碼說明如何在服務組態檔設定此屬性：The following configuration code illustrates how to set this property in the service configuration file:

related.span: MSMQ 3.0 中的有害訊息處理

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Drop = int32(1)

summary.span: 此選項可捨棄有害訊息。

span.span: This option drops the poison message.

summary.span: 訊息從未準時傳遞給應用程式。

span.span: The message never gets delivered to the application.

summary.span: 如果訊息的 TTL 此時已過期，那麼訊息便可能會出現在傳送者寄不出的信件佇列中。

span.span: If the message's TTL had already expired at this point, then the message may appear in the sender's Dead Letter Queue.

summary.span: 如果未過期的話，訊息不會出現在任何位置。

span.span: If not, the message does not appear anywhere.

summary.span: 這個選項表示，使用者不在意訊息是否遺失。

span.span: This option indicates that the user does not really care if the message is lost.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用平台：[!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)]、[!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)][!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]及 。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wxp](~/includes/wxp-md.md)], [!INCLUDE[ws2003](~/includes/ws2003-md.md)], and [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Fault = int32(0)

summary.span: 這個選項會將錯誤傳送至造成 ServiceHost 失敗的接聽程式。

span.span: This option sends a fault to the listener that caused the ServiceHost to fault.

summary.span: 訊息必須藉由某種外部機制從應用程式佇列中移除，應用程式才能繼續處理佇列中的訊息。

span.span: The message must be removed from the application queue by some external mechanism before the application can continue to process messages from the queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 適用平台：Windows XP、Windows Server 2003 以及 Windows Vista。Applicable platforms: Windows XP, Windows Server 2003, and Windows Vista.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Move = int32(3)

summary.span: 這個選項會將有害訊息移到有害訊息佇列，以便之後讓有害訊息處理應用程式進行處理。

span.span: This moves the poison message to a Poison Message Queue for later processing by a poison message handling application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用平台：僅有 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.ServiceModel.ReceiveErrorHandling Reject = int32(2)

summary.span: 這會指示 MSMQ 將負值通知傳回傳送的佇列管理員，說明應用程式無法接收訊息。

span.span: This instructs MSMQ to send a negative acknowledgement back to the sending queue manager that the message cannot be received by the application.

summary.span: 訊息會放在傳送的佇列管理員寄不出的信件佇列中。

span.span: The message is placed in the sending queue manager's Dead Letter Queue.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 應用平台：僅有 [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)]。Applicable platforms: [!INCLUDE[wv](~/includes/wv-md.md)] only.
